position_description_html:
Job Description

Duties


The AGM Global Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Service Delivery leads the operational management function of Information Technology Services (ITS) and maintains service levels to support effective ICT operations for Austrade.

The role is focused on providing leadership and guidance to the managers of ICT operations, security and IT support to ensure global ICT operational service levels are maintained and enhanced. This includes ensuring that ITS, tools and environments can be maintained, are secure and are sustainable.

Please refer to the Information Pack on our website for more details.

Eligibility


The successful applicant must be an Australian citizen and have, or be willing to undergo a security clearance to the level of Negative Vetting 2 as a condition of employment.

Notes


Applications close 11.30pm AEDT Sunday 22 January 2017
notes_html:
Applicants to vacancies notified in all formats of the electronic Public Service Gazette should be aware that;
.  the names of successful applicants may also be notified in all formats of the electronic Public Service Gazette
.  applicants found suitable may be offered similar employment opportunities by other Australian Public Service agencies
This notice is part of the electronic Public Service Gazette PS01-Thu - 05 Jan 2017 Published by Australian Public Service Commission.
job_title: Assistant General Manager (AGM) Global ICT Service Delivery
